parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.05

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables/disables given AI feature. Feature may be one of:

* <tt>"AwareFormationSoft"</tt>
* <tt>"CombatFormationSoft"</tt> 

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.95.145843 this command also supports [[disableAI]] / [[enableAI]] feature set via an alternative syntax.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> feature '''enableAIFeature''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] (see description)

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable, [[false]] - to disable

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit '''enableAIFeature''' [feature, enable] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.95.145843</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>true</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit to test AI feature for

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [feature, enable]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> feature: [[String]] - [[disableAI]] / [[enableAI]] feature

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> enabled: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable, [[false]] - to disable

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>"AwareFormationSoft" [[enableAIFeature]] [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>bob [[enableAIFeature]] ["AUTOTARGET", [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[checkAIFeature]], [[enableAI]], [[disableAI]], [[disableRemoteSensors]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
